The quote is attributed to Will Rogers: a late humorist and political commentator.
Jennifer Holt: curator of collections at the Will Rogers Museum & Birthplace Ranch, confirms the authenticity of the quote, stating that it was part of a larger piece sent by Rogers to the New York Times in 1932.
Rogers was critiquing the: technocracy" movement in his piece, which advocated for a scientifically or technically managed economy and society.
